John]] | editing = Ranjan Abraham | distributor = [[Lal Jose|LJ Films]] & Tricolor Entertainments. Europe - Indian Movies UK Ltd. | released = {{Film date|df=yes|2013|11|14}} | runtime = 113 minutes .[http://entertainment.oneindia.in/malayalam/news/2013/vineeth-sreenivasan-movie-thira-gets-clean-u-certificate-124666.html] | country = India | language = Malayalam | casting director = [[Dinesh Prabhakar]] | production company = Reels Magic }} '''''Thira''''' (English: ''Wave'') is a 2013 Indian [[Malayalam film|Malayalam]] [[thriller film]] directed by [[Vineeth Sreenivasan]] and scripted by his cousin Rakesh Mantodi.[http://www.thehindu.com/features/cinema/on-the-trail-of-a-mystery/article5350929.ece On the trail of a mystery] It stars [[Shobana]] alongside debutant [[Dhyan Sreenivasan]] in the lead roles. The film was produced by Manoj Menon under the banner ReelsMagic and distributed by LJ Films.http://newindianexpress.com/entertainment/malayalam/Setting-off-on-the-road-less-taken/2013/11/14/article1889379.ece ''Thira'' was announced to be the first installment in a trilogy of thriller films.[http://www.futurecreater.in/2013/11/thira-malayalam-movie-fdfs-review-thira.html Thira review] According to Srinivasan, the film was inspired from the book ''The Road of Lost Innocence: The True Story of a Cambodian Heroine'' by [[Somaly Mam]].http://www.sify.com/movies/yes-thira-is-inspired-confesses-vineeth-news-malayalam-nlulJ8ijhga.html The film marks the debut of Vineeth Sreenivasan's younger brother Dhyan Sreenivasan and also the return of actress Shobana to Malayalam cinema after almost a decade. It was filmed by [[Jomon T. John]] and has music composed by [[Shaan Rahman]]. Principal photography of the film took place in [[Hyderabad, India|Hyderabad]], [[Chennai]], [[Belgaum]] and [[Goa]]. It was released on 14 November 2013.The film was screened in IFFK 2013. Thira is a Malayalam movie to introduce the concept of casting director.http://www.thehindu.com/entertainment/movies/films-are-where-his-heart-is-and-dinesh-prabhakar-relishes-every/article19828203.ece ==Plot== The story is set in Karnataka and Goa. Dr. Rohini Pranab( [[Shobhana]]), a cardiac surgeon, who gives shelter to destitute girls, is the target of a group of criminals indulging in illegal human trafficking. The girls from her home are taken away by a gang, who also kidnaps the sister of a youth named Naveen( [[Dhyan Sreenivasan]]), right in front of his eyes. Now the two are doing all that they can do to trace the criminals along with Rohini's friends who later face some hardships. Both of them at last identify the secret place where the trafficked girls are kept and release them with the wise advice from Rohini and action from Naveen. ==Cast== *[[Shobhana]] as Dr. Rohini Pranab *[[Dhyan Sreenivasan]] as Naveen *[[Sijoy Varghese]] as Cabinet Minister Alex *[[Deepak Parambol]] as Deepak *Gaurav Vasudev as Kidnapper *Amritha Anil as Rhea * Harikrishnan * Sabhitha *Janan V Jacob as Bank Manager * Apoorva Bose (Voice for Amritha Anil) ==Soundtrack== {{Infobox album | name = Thira | type = Soundtrack | artist = [[Shaan Rahman]] | cover = | alt = | released = 2013 | recorded = | venue = | studio = | genre = | length = | language = [[Malayalam]] | label = | producer = Manoj Menon | prev_title = [[Hotel California (2013 film)|Hotel California]] | prev_year = 2013 | next_title = | next_year = }} The film's soundtrack is composed by [[Shaan Rahman]]. Lyrics are penned by [[Anu Elizabeth jose]] {{tracklist | headline = | extra_column = Artist(s) | total_length = | title1 = Theerathe Neelunne | extra1 = [[Vineeth Sreenivasan]] | length1 = 3:40 | title2 = Thazhvaaram | extra2 = [[Hesham Abdul Wahab|Hesham]] & [[Neha Nair]] | length2 = 5:05 | title3 = Nithya Sahaya Nadhe | extra3 = Neha Nair | length3 = 5:14 | title4 = Thaazhe Nee Tharame | extra4 = [[Sachin Warrier]], Job Kurian, Sayanora | length4 = 2:50 | title5 = Thazhvaaram | extra5 = Neha Nair | length5 = 2:52 }} ==Critical reception== Nowrunning.com remarked that "Vineeth Sreenivasan's ''Thira'' is a thoughtful exploration of a theme that is often discussed in hushed whispers. It's quite resolute in its objective, is extremely detailed, is involving for its most part and is charmingly acted as well."http://www.nowrunning.com/movie/12991/malayalam/thira/4468/review.htm [[Oneindia.in]] rated it 4 out of 5 and says "Here comes a movie which stands apart from the rest of Malayalam films, which entertains the viewers from start to end and makes us crave for more. Yes, ''Thira'' by Vineeth Sreenivasan is a well directed, well acted, engaging movie which can be termed as paisa vasool." http://entertainment.oneindia.in/malayalam/reviews/2013/thira-movie-review-124843.html [[The Times of India]] gave 3 stars out of 5 and mentioned "The narrative of the film moves at a steady pace despite the predictability that comes along with it".http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/regional/malayalam/movie-reviews/Thira/movie-review/25930361.cms [[Sify]].com described the film as average, "an okay one-time watch", while pointing out inspirations from the 2007 film, ''[[Trade (film)|Trade]]''.http://www.sify.com/movies/thira-review-malayalam-15043249.html [[The New Indian Express]] wrote, "''Thira'' is a satisfying thriller carried successfully by lead actress Shobhana".http://newindianexpress.com/entertainment/malayalam/A-wave-that-refuses-to-crash/2013/11/18/article1895662.ece ==Box office== ''[[Sify]]'' stated that ''Thira'' "opened well",{{cite web|url=http://www.sify.com/movies/boxoffice.php?id=15044090|title=Kerala Box-Office – October/November|date=27 November 2013|publisher=[[Sify]]}} but was "an average grosser" at the end of its run.{{cite web|url=http://www.sify.com/movies/boxoffice.php?id=15044952&cid=14625530|title=Kerala Box-Office – December 1 to 9|date=10 December 2013|publisher=Sify}} == Sequel == ''Thira'' is announced to be the first of the [[trilogy]] [[Thriller (genre)|thriller]] series by [[Vineeth Sreenivasan]]. Vineeth wrote on his official blog, "''Thira'' is not one film. It's a trilogy. If everything goes well by god's grace, Part 1 will be releasing in 2013. Part 2 and Part 3 will follow....".[http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/malayalam/movies/news/Thira-is-a-trilogy-Vineeth-Sreenivasan/articleshow/20474114.cms] Vineeth also revealed that Thira 2 will have a popular young actor of [[Malayalam cinema|Mollywood]] in lead role and he will also star in Thira 3, along with [[Shobana]], who played the lead in Thira. The [[sequel]] is planned to be more character oriented, rather than being an extension of ''Thira.'' It is confirmed by Vineeth that ''Thira 2'' will be focusing more on the character, Amar and the part of [[Dhyan Sreenivasan|Dhyan]] is over with the first film.[http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/malayalam/movies/news/Many-incidents-in-Thira-are-based-on-real-life/articleshow/26530050.cms] ==Festival screenings== The film was an official selection for the following film festivals: * Gwinnett Center International Film Festival - International Competition section. ==Awards== ;[[Vanitha Film Awards]]{{cite web | url=http://www.keralatv.in/2014/01/vanitha-film-awards-2014/ | title=Vanitha Film Awards 2014 | publisher=keralatv.in | date=6 January 2014 | accessdate=6 January 2014}} *Best Actress - Shobhana ;[[Asianet Film Awards]] *Best Debut Actor - Dhyan Sreenivasan ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== * {{IMDb title|3329774}} * [https://www.facebook.com/ThiraMovieMalayalam Thira - Official Facebook Page] {{Vineeth Sreenivasan}} [[Category:Indian films]] [[Category:2013 films]] [[Category:2010s Malayalam-language films]] [[Category:2010s thriller films]] [[Category:Indian thriller films]] [[Category:Malayalam cinema]] [[Category:Films directed by Vineeth Sreenivasan]]
